description: The CiragoLink+ Network USB Storage turns any USB mass storage device into a networked attached storage. With 4 USB ports on the CiragoLink+ and a maximum capacity of 2 TB per USB port, you can have up to 8 TB of storage connected to your network and your own personal cloud at your fingertips.
title: Cirago International (Direct) NUS2000 CiragoLink+ USB Network Storage
